author.bio: Web application security and accessibility evangelist. Software instructor. Conference lecturer and presenter.
Academic technologist and pedagogic outfitter. WordPressing since 2010. Themes, plugins, security, tweaks

wordpressPost.title: Vulnerable WordPress Plugins Report for the Week of August 16, 2019
wordpressPost.excerpt: Vulnerable Plugins There are eighteen issues this week, with eight unfixed.  The most critical this week is an Arbitrary File Upload vulnerability via Cross-Site Request Forgery vulnerability in the Maintenance...
wordpressPost.content:
Vulnerable Plugins

There are eighteen issues this week, with eight unfixed.  The most critical this week is an Arbitrary File Upload vulnerability via Cross-Site Request Forgery vulnerability in the Maintenance plugin. No fix is available as of this publishing date, and the plugin has been closed in the public repository.

View this week’s vulnerable plugins list.
